description:
11.63 deflicker
Remove temporal frame luminance variations.

It accepts the following options:
name: deflicker

parameters.description: Set moving-average filter size in frames. Default is 5. Allowed range is 2 - 129.
parameters.name: size, s

parameters.description:
Set averaging mode to smooth temporal luminance variations.

Available values are:

‘am’

Arithmetic mean

‘gm’

Geometric mean

‘hm’

Harmonic mean

‘qm’

Quadratic mean

‘cm’

Cubic mean

‘pm’

Power mean

‘median’

Median
parameters.name: mode, m

parameters.description: Do not actually modify frame. Useful when one only wants metadata.
parameters.name: bypass

source:
11.63 deflicker

Remove temporal frame luminance variations.

It accepts the following options:

size, s

Set moving-average filter size in frames. Default is 5. Allowed range is 2 - 129.

mode, m

Set averaging mode to smooth temporal luminance variations.

Available values are:

‘am’

Arithmetic mean

‘gm’

Geometric mean

‘hm’

Harmonic mean

‘qm’

Quadratic mean

‘cm’

Cubic mean

‘pm’

Power mean

‘median’

Median

bypass

Do not actually modify frame. Useful when one only wants metadata.
